summary: This is a simple modification about Serana, based on  basskimm models from Girls of Skyrim,Serana Revised and a few tweaks of mine.
descriptionHtml:
In this version you have all the files necessaries to install this mod, so you can use the NMM as usual and install it automatically.(Only optional are manually added to avoid conflicts)

IF U LIKE IT... ENDORSE IT!!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Update Notes

1.1 
- Added Nord Vampire eyes (this time glows as it should be)
- Changed Serana\'s default armor to NONE (You can change Serana Inventory from scratch).
- Added an optional files with a fang version, from \"Female Vampires Have Fangs\" , plus her race was changed from nord to nordvampire.
- Serana\'s hair is playable. To use the original hair the only way is download the A version. 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Additional statements

1.- For those who are asking about marry Serana, threres a mod already out there... heres the link:   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28685 (UPDATED)

2.- Since this a modified version of \"Girls of Skyrim\" , i cannot play with different variation of face morphs , especially eyes. So any further requirements will be considered under that limit.

3.- Idk yet but i guess you will not have issues with the CBBE or UNP  body replacements, since this is only a head replacement and minor changes in the actor sheet. (not confirmed yet).

4.- If you force her into marriage,(via multiple marriages mod) she will hold any armor or clothes, regardless if shes dismissed or not.(That means she will not strip).

UPDATE!

5.- I\'ve been trying to find a final solution to the dark head thing in the web but no luck so far. Anyway u are free to try the following:

enter the console

1.- Select serana
2.- Write \"setnpcweight 70\"
3.-done

Now you should see her head skin color the way it supposed to be. 

OR

I\'m not sure about this yet but maybe the dark head thing is caused because an eye file in the textures folder. If u are using my recommended mods specially the eyes ones.... go to this location: \\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\\Data\\Textures\\actors\\character\\eyes 
In there if u find 2 files named eyevampire_01.dds and eyevampire_02.dds, delete the 01. MAYBE that should do the trick.

6.- I wouldn\'t recommend to use the optional files (specially the ones that modifies Serana\'s inventory)  but only AFTER the Dawnguard main quest, just to avoid possible bugs, glitches OR surprises.... like find her the first time naked! XD

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Known issues

* If you send Selana home or if she\'s already waiting at base, on the next passing day outside, she will be naked. (She will reequip her gear once you take her out tho).

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

WARNING!

THIS MOD DOESN\'T INCLUDE ANY ADDITIONAL HAIRSTYLES, FACE PARTS, BODY PARTS.   IF YOU WANT TO ADD THOSE, U HAVE TO DOWNLOAD THE PROPER MODS (credits below).

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

SPECIAL THANKS
To basskimm for allow me to do this mod.

CREDITS

Girls of Skyrim - add 4 Companions and 5 Playable Characters
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21038

Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE- by Caliente
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666

BFG - Better FaceGen by Radioragae
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6953

XCE - Dawnguard
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21839

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22522/

Dawnguard Vampire Armors CBBEv3 Echo 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22239

Improved Eyes Skyrim
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9249

The Eyes Of Beauty
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722
author: Reisack
